Author: Nunubu Nubu
Name: AI Companion
Description: A void-touched bardic companion for Dalamud. Chat window, persona.txt, routing triggers with whitelist, native/IPC chat send, and chronicles — tuned for Dalamud 13 + .NET 9.
Punchline: Song for a soul! Any song for the price of one’s soul—bargain deal!
Changelog: v5.0.0.3 — Persona tab/preview, routing UI with /say & /party tests, ChatWindow post-to-channel toggles, IPC/native sending, API 13 ready.
